title: Levqor AI Workflow Builder Now Available
body:
We're excited to announce AI Workflow Builder is now live!

Create powerful automation workflows with our new AI-assisted builder.

Key benefits:
- Natural language workflow creation
- Smart step suggestions
- Error prevention

Get started today at levqor.ai
